label: 不動
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: Chief of the five great mystic kings (godaimyōō).Usually represented with a fierce visage, a sword in his right hand to smite the wicked, and a rope in his left to catch and bind them. Important in esoteric Buddhism. [See 五大明王]
